name: Snowboard Snowboard
description:
Made this for a polar bear jam in 48 hours, it's a pretty simple game.

Press space or click to jump, if the polar bear jumps in mid-air he can do a flip jump to gain some extra air momentum.

Collect coins to add 500 points to your score.

Red arrows induce a fire fueled speed boost.

All music, graphics, etc. done by Luke Vincent.
